description: This file declares functions related to managing link metrics in the RdkEasyMeshController component. It includes the interface for updating station link metrics and querying link metrics periodically.

methods.name: map_update_assoc_sta_link_metrics
methods.description: Updates the link metrics for a station, given station info and link metrics.

methods.name: map_periodic_link_metric_query_timer_cb
methods.description: Callback function for periodic link metric query timer.
